1.content:
First of all, let's narrow down the choices a bit.
Should we go with Students?
Or rather characters from the monestary?
Not really a lot of them, but Enemies/other side characters?
1.title: Choosing the character.

11.content: Definitely the most characters to choose from, to help it narrow down the choices a bit, let's start with choosing a house.
11.title: After Timeskip

111.content: Good choice. The house I chose for my first playthrough. Now which guy do you want to be found by?
111.title: Golden Deer

1113.content: Which one will it be?
1113.title: Someone else (Ignatz or Lorenz)

112.content: Going for the Blue Lions? Well they do have the most guys after all.
112.title: Blue Lions

1123.content: The last three choices for the Blue Lions.
1123.title: Others (Dedue, Felix, Ashe)

choices: The shorty of the house Caspar
113.content: And Last but not least, the Black Eagles, the only house without a male Leader, but still some good choices.
113.title: Black Eagles

12.content: Not really that many choices but, still some pretty handsome guys.
12.title: Monestary

13.content: Not the most memorable characters, but hey, a few more choices won't hurt.
13.title: Enemies/Side characters

info.brief_description: You'll play the part of a shrunken Byleth or your OC found by one of the guys from FE3H
info.description:
With the new Fire Emblem Three houses being out, I thought, why not make a Macro story about it, since there are quite a few "interesting" guys in the game. You can either take the role of Byleth, teacher at the Monestary or play your own character.


Rules:
Not really many rules, just a few for the base.

1.) Byleth or your own character is male in this story

2.) Male giants only though and keep it to shrinking, rather than growing.

3.) No one sentence chapters or chapters just to add you own options, keep it at at least 3-5 sentences per added chapter

4.) Nothing too gorey or brutal, everything else is fine.

Please add and rate the story and most importantly, have fun with it ;)
